title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2022). rpcdas: PCDaS API Wrapper. R package version 0.1.3, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/rpcdas/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rpcdas: PCDaS API Wrapper},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.3},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/rpcdas/}, }

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
text: rpcdas R package wrapper functions PCDaS API.

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
code: remotes::install_github("rfsaldanha/rpcdas") library(rpcdas)

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
text: PCDaS API requires access token. receiving token, can inform package function store token renviron convenient use. running line , package functions access PCDaS token internally.
code: Sys.setenv("pcdas_token" = "YOUR_PCDAS_TOKEN")

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
text: package provides functions convenient use PCDaS API.

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
code: list_pcdas_tables()

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
code: # Total number of deaths by municipality of residence in 2010. get_sim(agg = "mun_res", ano = 2010)  # Total number of deaths by state of occurrence in 2010. get_sim(agg = "uf_ocor", ano = 2010)  # Total number of deaths by state of residence in 2010, filtering ages between 10 and 30 years old. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, idade_a = 10, idade_b = 30)  # Total number of deaths by state of residence in 2010 were the basic cause of death starting with the letter I. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, cid_like = "I")  # Total number of deaths by state of residence in 2010 were the basic cause of deaths are some of the vector. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, cid_in = c("I219", "B342", "R98"))  # Total number of deaths by state of residence in 2010 with a SQL filter. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, more_filters = "LEFT(CAUSABAS, 1) IN ('V', 'W', 'X', 'Y')")

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
code: # Total number of births by municipality of residence in 2010 get_sinasc(agg = "mun_res", ano = 2010)  # Total number of births by state of borth in 2010 get_sinasc(agg = "uf_ocor", ano = 2010)  # Total number of births by municipality of residence in 2010, with sex filter get_sinasc(agg = "mun_res", ano = 2010, sexo = "Masculino")

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
code: # Total number of hospitalizations by municipality of residence in 2010 get_sih(agg = "mun_res", ano = 2010)  # Total number of hospitalizations by state of the hospital in 2010 get_sih(agg = "uf_ocor", ano = 2010)  # Total number of hospitalizations by municipality of residence in 2010 with sex filter get_sih(agg = "mun_res", ano = 2010, sexo = "Masculino")  # Total number of hospitalizations by state of residence in 2010 with age filters get_sih(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, idade_a = 10, idade_b = 30)

title: PCDaS API Wrapper
text: function allows generic query PCDaS indexes write SQL query. query may return 10,000 lines maximum.
code: generic_pcdas_query(sql_query = "SELECT N_AIH, DT_INTER, PROC_REA FROM \"datasus-sih\" LIMIT 100")

title: Create CID sequences — cid_seq
code: cid_seq(a, b)

title: Create CID sequences — cid_seq
text: character. Starting CID code. b character. Ending CID code.

title: Executes a generic PCDaS query — generic_pcdas_query
text: pcdas_token character. PCDaS API token. provided, function look renvirom. sql_query character. SQL.

title: Executes a generic PCDaS query — generic_pcdas_query
Executes a generic PCDaS query — generic_pcdas_query
text: query limited retrieve 100 variables 10,000 records ElasticSearch cluster. query, must usea database listed list_pcdas_tables.

title: Executes a generic PCDaS query — generic_pcdas_query
code: # Runs a query generic_pcdas_query(sql_query = "SELECT N_AIH, DT_INTER, PROC_REA FROM \"datasus-sih\" LIMIT 100") #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token.

Get PCDaS token from renviron — get_pcdas_token_renviron
code: get_pcdas_token_renviron()

title: Get PCDaS token from renviron — get_pcdas_token_renviron
Get PCDaS token from renviron — get_pcdas_token_renviron
text: PCDaS token may stored renviron Sys.setenv("pcdas_token" = "YOUR_PCDAS_TOKEN"). function retrivies token stored renviron.

what: Get hospitalization data from SIH — get_sih
title: Get hospitalization data from SIH — get_sih
Get hospitalization data from SIH — get_sih
code: get_sih(   agg,   ano,   pcdas_token = NULL,   sexo = NULL,   idade_a = NULL,   idade_b = NULL,   more_filters = NULL )

title: Get hospitalization data from SIH — get_sih
text: agg character. Spatial aggregation level. uf_res UF residence. uf_ocor UF occurrence. regsaude_res regiao de saude residence. regsaude_ocor regiao de saúde occurence. mun_res municipality residence. mun_ocor municipality ocurrence. ano numeric. Year birth pcdas_token character. PCDaS API token. provided, function look renvirom. sexo character. Sex new birth Masculino males, Feminino females Ignorado unknown. idade_a numeric. Minimum age patient, years. idade_b numeric. Maximum age patient, years. more_filters character. Additional filters can added using parameter, SQL query.

title: Get hospitalization data from SIH — get_sih
text: function uses raw data Sistema de Informações de Hospitalares SUS (SIH) available PCDaS API. documentation data can found https://pcdas.icict.fiocruz.br/conjunto-de-dados/sistema-de-informacoes-hospitalares--sus-sihsus/. idade_a supplied, query filter records age less equal. idade_b supplied, query filter records age equal. supplied, query filter records interval, closed sides.

title: Get hospitalization data from SIH — get_sih
code: # Some examples get_sih(agg = "mun_res", ano = 2010) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token. get_sih(agg = "uf_ocor", ano = 2010) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token.

what: Get mortality data from SIM — get_sim
title: Get mortality data from SIM — get_sim
Get mortality data from SIM — get_sim
code: get_sim(   agg,   ano,   pcdas_token = NULL,   sexo = NULL,   idade_a = NULL,   idade_b = NULL,   cid_like = NULL,   cid_in = NULL,   more_filters = NULL )

title: Get mortality data from SIM — get_sim
text: agg character. Spatial aggregation level. uf_res UF residence. uf_ocor UF occurrence. regsaude_res regiao de saude residence. regsaude_ocor regiao de saúde occurence. mun_res municipality residence. mun_ocor municipality ocurrence. ano numeric. Year death. pcdas_token character. PCDaS API token. provided, function look renvirom. sexo character. Sex deceased. Masculino males, Feminino females Ignorado unknown. idade_a numeric. Minimum age deceased, years. idade_b numeric. Maximum age deceased, years. cid_like character. CID-10 code basic cause death. Used LIKE operator. cid_in character vector. CID-10 codes basic cause death. Used operator. more_filters character. Additional filters can added using parameter, SQL query.

title: Get mortality data from SIM — get_sim
text: function uses raw data Sistema de Informações de Mortalidade (SIM) available PCDaS API. documentation data can found https://pcdas.icict.fiocruz.br/conjunto-de-dados/sistema-de-informacoes-de-mortalidade-sim/. idade_a supplied, query filter records age less equal. idade_b supplied, query filter records age equal. supplied, query filter records interval, closed sides. cid_like value used query LIKE operator.

title: Get mortality data from SIM — get_sim
code: # Some examples get_sim(agg = "mun_res", ano = 2010) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token. get_sim(agg = "uf_ocor", ano = 2010) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, idade_a = 10, idade_b = 30) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, cid_like = "I") #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, cid_in = c("I219", "B342", "R98")) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token. get_sim(agg = "uf_res", ano = 2010, cid_in = cid_seq("I01", "I10")) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. Please provide PCDaS API token.

Year birth pcdas_token character. PCDaS API token. provided, function look renvirom. sexo character. Sex new birth Masculino males, Feminino females Ignorado unknown. more_filters character. Additional filters can added using parameter, SQL query.

Please provide PCDaS API token. get_sinasc(agg = "uf_ocor", ano = 2010) #> Error in get_pcdas_token_renviron(): PCDaS token API not provided and not found on renviron. title: Execute PCDaS query request — pcdas_query_request
code: pcdas_query_request(body, throttle_rate = 30/60, max_tries = 3)

title: Execute PCDaS query request — pcdas_query_request
text: body Body request, JSON format. throttle_rate Rate requests per second allowed. Defaults 30/60 (thirty requests per minute). max_tries Max number retries fail. Defaults 3.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
code: lhs %>% rhs

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.
